testcase.title: Response DB validation for GRC Id with no depth parameter

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "REST" API
I pass a "dataset = globalRegComparison and grcType = all and countryDepth = AU,CN" as parameter to "RetrieveCI" operation
I get a response with "DBQueryForId_GRCBrowse_Dual1_id" in json "GlobalRegComparisons.id"

testcase.title: Check the presence of all the tags

steps.title: I am authenticated user accessing "REST" API

I pass a "dataset = globalRegComparison and grcType = all and countryDepth = INT,CA,US,EU,AT,BE,BG,HR,CY,CZ,DK,EE,FI,FR,DE,GR,HU,IS,IR,IT,LV,LT,LU,MT,NL,NO,PL,PT,RO,RU,RS,SK,SI,SP,SE,CH,TR,UA,UK,ASE,AU,CN,HK,IN,ID,JP,MY,NZ,PH,SG,KR,TW,TH,VN,MER,SIC,AR,BR,CL,CO,CR,GT,MX,PA,PE,VE,GCC,DZ,EG,IQ,IL,JO,KE,LB,MA,NG,SA,ZA,TN,AE and depth = db" as parameter to "RetrieveCI" operation
response contains "GlobalRegComparisons.id" in json fields
response contains "GlobalRegComparisons.Abstract" in json fields
response contains "GlobalRegComparisons.Sections" in json fields
response contains "GlobalRegComparisons.Title" in json fields
